# cgssr

Provide R-friendly format data of Chinese General Social Survey (CGSS); 
    English translation of survey questions and answers from Chinese;
    Built-in CGSS codebook in Chinese and English Version;
    Search function for both Chinese and English user to find the variables via keywords.
